mapper.sql: idc_id, pad_id, pad_code, batch_number, pad_name, pad_ip, pad_control_port, pad_manage_port, pad_control_id, pad_manage_control_id, user_control_id, pad_video_id, user_video_id, pad_status, user_pad_status, fault_status, bind_status, status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, remote_version, enable_status, version_code, pad_sn, device_id, vm_status, vm_mac, grant_open_status, maint_status, recover_status, recover_info, task_id, pad_type, pad_source, rom_version, imei, pad_classify, control_protocol, user_pad_id_t2, pad_id_t2, bind_mobile_t2, left_online_time_t2, left_control_time_t2, total_online_time_t2, total_control_time_t2, pad_control_count_t2, pad_control_time_t2, bind_time_t2, creater_t2, create_time_t2, modifier_t2, modify_time_t2, expire_time_t2, pad_grade_t2, left_recovery_day_t2, user_id_t2, offline_notice_t2, offline_notice_set_time_t2, pad_source_t2, user_pad_name_t2, order_id_t2, renewal_time_t2, idc_name_t3, control_name_t4, control_name_t5, control_name_t6, user_mobile_phone_t7
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from view_pad_user
and exists (select device_id from rf_device rf_d where 1=1 and view_pad_user.device_id = rf_d.device_id
and ip2int(rf_d.device_ip) >= ip2int(#{map.deviceStartIp})
and ip2int(rf_d.device_ip) <= ip2int(#{map.deviceEndIp})
)
order by ${orderByClause}
